title: How To Start A Backyard Tilapia Farm With a $1000

subtasks: Calculate fish yield potential (e.g., 70 tons per acre)
Discuss required tank sizes (e.g., 4-meter diameter, 10,000 liters)
Explain feed management (low protein feed, reducing costs)
Address environmental benefits (reduced fish meal usage)
Highlight economic benefits (export potential, job creation)
Provide training services for biofloc technology (online/offline)
Offer services for small-scale farmers (backyard aquaculture)
Promote agricultural investment (including fish farming) in Africa
Discuss the importance of appropriate technology for Africa
Highlight benefits over traditional methods (e.g., RAS systems)
Explore expansion into educational and prison settings
